Oops! Thanx for reminding me, Dachande!

::Shredder::

Shredder flies out of the base, heading for the battle at the 
Cybertronian Fire. He remembered his time back at the Preds well, and 
this was gonna be payback..

Shredder arms both chainguns, speeding up toward his destination.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> Alloran don't forget about your Destrons, same with you Yanshosh
> 
> ::My Destrons::
> 
>     They landed next to Galvatron. "Hey."
